message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $120. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down to $100. This is a good deal for both of us, considering the product's value to you. Let's close this deal!
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $100, but I'm still a bit higher on my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $85. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I'm really trying to make this work. I can do $95. This is my final offer. If we can't agree, I'll have to move on to other options.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher on my budget. I'm thinking $85 is a more reasonable price for the product. Can you meet me at this price?
